quote: People who say it cannot be done should not interrupt those who are doing it. – George Bernard Shaw
fact: On average, people fear spiders more than they do death.
joke: I dreamed about drowning in an ocean made out of orange soda last night. It took me a while to work out it was just a Fanta sea.
